name: CleanupFiles
author: Stefan Schramek
requirements: This script requires Python to be installed on your system.
description: This script deletes unwanted files when the job is done.

options.name: unwantedFileExtensions
description: This is a list of file extensions that will be deleted.
Multiple addresses can be separated with comma.

options.name: unwantedFileNames
description: This is a list of filenames that will be deleted.
Multiple addresses can be separated with comma.
